insert into t_order set user_id = #{userId}, store_id = #{storeId}, payment = #{payment}, total_order_price = #{salePrice}, pickup_time = #{pickupTime}, order_status = 1
insert into t_order_detail set order_id = #{orderId}, product_id = #{productId}, quantity = #{quantity}, sale_price = #{salePrice}

INSERT INTO t_review (review_level, order_detail_id) SELECT CASE WHEN o.order_status = 5 THEN 0 END AS review_level, od.order_detail_id FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id WHERE o.order_status = 5;
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.region_nm_id regionNmId, r.region_nm regionNm, s.store_id storeId, s.nm , s.address FROM t_user u inner JOIN t_region_nm r ON u.region_nm_id = r.region_nm_id inner JOIN t_store s ON u.region_nm_id = s.region_nm_id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
